question: The "Port Said" is located in which country?
explanation: Port Said, established in 1859, is a major port located in Egypt along the coast of the Mediterranean Sea, which forms the starting point of the Suez Canal. Port Fuad, which lies on the eastern bank of the Suez Canal. Port Said acted as a global city since its establishment and flourished particularly during the nineteenth and the first half of the twentieth century when it was inhabited by various nationalities and religions. Most of them were from Mediterranean countries, and they coexisted in tolerance, forming a cosmopolitan community. Port Said has been ranked the second among the Egyptian cities according to the Human Development Index in 2009 and 2010. Due to its excellent geographic location, Port Said is designed to attract logistics startups along with import and export businesses.
